item.title: CS134-lecture-20210617
item.description: Notes on upcoming exam # The join symbol on canvas will be represented as SQL # File: SQL Slides We can use SQL to implement our relational models in code. History # We will be covering the SQL core. DDL = data definition language, this corresponds to our relational model. insert, delete, update query DBMS should implement all of the SQL standards, but they may not in some places.
